text: Elvis is a 2022 biographical musical drama movie directed by Baz Luhrmann. The movie stars Austin Butler as the title character, Tom Hanks, Helen Thomson, Richard Roxburgh, Olivia DeJonge, Luke Bracey, Natasha Bassett, David Wenham, Kelvin Harrison Jr., Xavier Samuel, and Kodi Smit-McPhee. Elvis premiered at the Cannes Film Festival on May 25, 2022. It was theatrically released in Australia on June 23, 2022, and in the United States on June 24, by Warner Bros. Pictures. The movie had positive reviews from critics. At the 95th Academy Awards, it was nominated for Best Picture. ==Soundtrack== The soundtrack to the movie was released by RCA Records on the same day as the theatrical release of the movie. It is produced by Baz Luhrmann and Anton Monstead, who also worked on the soundtrack of The Great Gatsby. The album contains 36 songs. ==References== Category:2022 drama movies Category:2020s biographical movies Category:2022 musical movies Category:2020s epic movies Category:Australian biographical movies Category:Australian musical movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American musical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Elvis Presley Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about singers Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies directed by Baz Luhrmann Category:Movies set in Tennessee
title: Elvis (2022 movie)
